name: Cyber Maze- Ludum Dare 49 Edition
description:
Cyber Maze is the most annoying remake of classic round maze you'll ever see. It will make your sanity unstable. For sure. 

NOTE: On web version press "1" to correctly handle mouse input

Controls:

Mouse - rotate board

Esc - Manual mouse capture toggle (win/linux)

1 - Capture mouse (web)

2 - Show mouse (web)

Credits:

Font - https://www.fontget.com/font/super-g-type-2/

Sound effects:

- https://freesound.org/people/kickhat/sounds/435147/

- https://freesound.org/people/michael_grinnell/sounds/512471/
